Package org.whiteflagprotocol.java

Class WfParticipant

java.lang.Object
org.whiteflagprotocol.java.WfParticipant
public class WfParticipant extends Object
Whiteflag participant class

This class represents a Whiteflag participant. It is used to keep track of originators, their messages and shared cryptographic keys.

Since:
1.1

    • setAuthURL

      public void setAuthURL(String url) throws MalformedURLException
      Sets the authentication URL from an A1 message used to identify the participant
      Parameters:
      url - a string with an URL pointinng to the authentication data
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - if the string does not contain a valid URL
      Whiteflag standard x-reference:
      5.1.2.1 Method 1: URL Validation

    • setEcdhPublicKey

      public void setEcdhPublicKey(String rawPublicKey) throws WfException
      Sets the ECDH public key used to derrive the negotiated key with this participant
      Parameters:
      rawPublicKey - a string with the raw 264-bit compressed public ECDH key
      Throws:
      WfException - if the provided raw public key is invalid
      Whiteflag standard x-reference:
      5.2.4 Message Encryption

    • setEcdhPublicKey

      public void setEcdhPublicKey(ECPublicKey ecdhPublicKey)
      Sets the ECDH public key used to derrive the negotiated key with this participant
      Parameters:
      ecdhPublicKey - a ECPublicKey ECDH public key
      Whiteflag standard x-reference:
      5.2.4 Message Encryption
